title: California Storm Brings Welcome Rain During Record-Setting Drought
teaser: It rained again on Wednesday in California â€” welcome news to just about everyone. The state is in the midst of a record-setting drought. But the state will need a lot more rain to change the long term outlook. And some residents in areas affected by wildfires are guarding against mud and debris flows.
